section.title: Description
section.p: The recommended next dose of a particular vaccine for a given patient. It does not deal with usage projections over a population. This forecast is based on application of the rules of the series dose.

stentry.p: The date that is the earliest recommended date. This is not always the earliest date that a dose administered will be acceptable.
The latest date patient should receive the vaccine
The date when patient is considered behind schedule.
The ideal date upon which the patient should receive the next dose of the vaccine.
